description: This file contains the implementation of configuration load and save functions for a DSLH variable record object within a broadband management system. It primarily provides functions to load configuration from the system registry and a stub to save configuration, with detailed comments and licensing information.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroLoadConfig(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Loads configuration settings for the variable record, including notification status and registration for parameter notifications if applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroSaveConfig(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Stub function intended to save configuration, currently not implemented but contains commented code for database interaction.
